help-file.title: LANGUAGES
help-file.content:
Every race has its own language, and some can also speak a smattering of other languages. Unless you are proficient in a language, the communications of someone speaking that language will be incomprehensible or garbled. You gradually learn another language by being in contact with those who speak it and listening to it for long enough.
There is currently one language for each race, and a private god language.
